general_info.summary: This document outlines various academic programs, administrative functions, and student support services offered by Sharda University for the 2025-26 academic year. It lists different schools, examination reports, financial information such as scholarships and fee structures, and career development resources. Additionally, it includes operational aspects like banking services, university policies, and health and well-being initiatives, alongside specific program details for the School of Pharmacy and other university-wide offerings.

admissionRequirements.programName: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

description.summary: This course is designed for individuals curious about the chemical formulations of drugs used to treat diseases and promote healthy lifestyles. It is also suited for students seeking a fulfilling career in medication development, particularly those with strong research skills who aim to learn techniques for creating safe and effective medications.
description.raw_content:
This course is for individuals who...
Are curious to know about the chemical formulation of drugs that treat various diseases and help in maintaining a healthy lifestyle.
Students who are looking for...
A fulfilling career by learning the techniques to develop safe and effective medication. Students who wish to apply their strong research skills are the best fit for the programme.
